# Nemanjić Dynasty: The Birth of the Kingdom__disambig_1

| image                    = Nemanjić Dynasty The Birth Of The Kingdom title card.jpg

Nemanjić Dynasty: The Birth оf The Kingdom ( / Nemanjići: Rađanje Kraljevine) is a Serbian historical drama television series about the Serbian medieval dynasty Nemanjići. The pilot episode aired on 31 December in 2017., as a special episode for New Year’s Eve, and the series premiered on Radio Television of Serbia on 17 February 2018. After broadcasting the pilot episode, critics were mostly negative, especially about the language and anachronisms used in the episode, special effects, and acting.
